abstract: The Yankees are close to completing a new contract proposal for C.C. Sabathia, who can opt out of his current deal after the World Series.
snippet: The Yankees are close to completing a new contract proposal for C.C. Sabathia, who can opt out of his current deal after the World Series.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - The Yankees are close to completing a new contract proposal for the left-hander C.C. Sabathia, which they intend to present to him before he can opt out of his current contract, according to a baseball executive who spoke on the condition of anonymity.

headline.main: New Offer for Sabathia in the Works
